overview:
Nicole is a Music Selector, Writer, and advocate of Tech, New Media, and the Arts.

She works at Mobile Roadie as Head of Partner Relations/VIP Client Services.

She came from Yahoo! Music as Interactive Director of Partner Relations. Prior to that she was Senior Interactive Producer at KCRW, a world-renowned radio station broadcasting at kcrw.com and from 89.9 fm in Los Angeles, CA. While at KCRW, Nicole handled content management and page buildouts at kcrw.com. She oversaw social media initiatives leading to over 30,000 friends, followers, and fans of the station.

As an Associate Producer at Ten Music, a commercial music house representing top indie record labels and composers, Nicole worked with major advertising agencies to produce original music for nationally-aired television commercials for brands like Grey Goose, Oil of Olay, DirecTV, Mercedes, John Frieda and the NHL. She has worked with members of the original Black Eyed Peas, RedCola, and The Rondo Brothers. She signed MC Lyte, a female hip-hop artist, for a major television campaign for Old Navy and discovered an unsigned indie rock band named Marqui Adora whose music was featured in a national spot for Nissan.
